mapper.select: select picture from resumeinfo where memberID = #{memberID}

select r.memberID, r.education, r.career, r.employmentType, r.exSalary, r.disableGrade, r.picture, r.exArea, r.exField, r.military, p.memberID, p.name, p.birth, p.email, p.phone, p.address, p.address2 from ResumeInfo r, PersonalMember p where r.memberID = p.memberID and r.memberID = #{memberID}
mapper.insert: insert into ResumeInfo (memberID, education, career, employmentType, exSalary, disableGrade, picture, exArea, exField, military) values (#{memberID}, #{education}, #{career}, #{employmentType}, #{exSalary}, #{disableGrade}, #{picture}, #{exArea}, #{exField}, #{military})
mapper.update: update ResumeInfo set education = #{education}, career = #{career}, employmentType = #{employmentType}, exSalary = #{exSalary}, disableGrade = #{disableGrade}, picture = #{picture}, exArea = #{exArea}, exField = #{exField}, military = #{military} where memberID = #{memberID}
